name: Oasis Keeper
description: A massive monstrosity that lives in desert oases, the Oasis Keeper can blend into its sandy surroundings and features a powerful stinger and bite that can incapacitate foes with poison.
memorable: Its ability to calm creatures that drink its poisoned water adds a unique layer of control in combat and strategy.
goals: To protect its oasis while incapacitating those who threaten it.
relations: It may be found near other desert creatures or as a guardian of a specific oasis.
strengths: High Strength and Dexterity make it a formidable melee combatant, with abilities that control the battlefield and incapacitate foes.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence makes it susceptible to mental attacks and reduces its strategic capabilities.
attacks: Utilizes its stinger and bite, dealing significant piercing damage and applying debilitating poison effects.
most_powerful_ability: Pacifying Secretions allows it to poison water and calm creatures that consume it, greatly influencing encounters.
senses: Blindsight up to 20 ft. grants it a unique advantage for stealthy ambushes.
skills: Excels in Stealth and Perception checks, making it highly aware of its surroundings and capable of remaining hidden.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and condition of being poisoned
Can hold its breath for 30 minutes, facilitating stealthy submerged attacks
Advantage on Stealth checks in sandy terrain or when underwater
Resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
Can make two attacks in one turn with a multiattack feature
test_queries: Huge desert monster that uses poison
stealthy creature living in desert oasis
giant monster with a calming poison
predator that attacks with stinger and bite
creature that can hold breath underwater
